alert.note: Alert for Putnam; Schuyler (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 30 at 8:30AM CDT until June 30 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 AM CDT FOR EASTERN PUTNAM AND SCHUYLER COUNTIES... At 830 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles south of Centerville to 11 miles east of Unionville to 11 miles north of Greencastle, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to r oofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Queen City, Greentop, Downing, Glenwood, Worthington and Livonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
